mapper.select: select (select MAX(JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX) from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID) as MAX_VALUE, JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID, JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX-1 as JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 1 or JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 2 or JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 4

select JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY, QRCODE.QRCODE_DIRECTORY from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join QRCODE on QRCODE.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = #{JOBORDER_ID}
select count(*) as USE_ON from JOBORDER where BOM_DETAIL_ID = #{BOM_DETAIL_ID}
select JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY from JOBORDER_DETAIL where JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER = #{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}

select ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID, ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME from WORKER_PROPERTY inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = WORKER_PROPERTY.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID where WORKER_PROPERTY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID}

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_MAIN_PRODUCTCODE from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID =JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_LIST on BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_LIST_ID where ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID}

select count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_NOT_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_COMPLETE' from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID =JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_LIST on BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_LIST_ID where ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID}

select * from ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT inner join PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY on PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID where not ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME = '해당없음' order by ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID
select JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}

select JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME = #{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME} and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTUSEON = 1 and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID = (select MAX(JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID) from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME = #{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME})
select ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}
select * from JOBORDER where JOBORDER_ID = #{JOBORDER_ID}
select * from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}

select * from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME = #{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME} and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTUSEON = 1 and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID = (select MAX(JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID) from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME = #{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME})

select ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME, EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING_NUMBER from EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING inner join ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT on ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID where EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_INDEX_ID = 1 and not EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID is null

select ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME, EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING_NUMBER from EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING inner join ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT on ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID where EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_INDEX_ID = 2 and not EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID is null

select ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME, EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING_NUMBER from EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING inner join ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT on ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID where EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_INDEX_ID = 3 and not EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID is null

select ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME, EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING_NUMBER from EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING inner join ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT on ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID where EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_INDEX_ID = 4 and not EQUIPMENT_SENSOR_MATCHING.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID is null
select * from ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT where ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = #{ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID}
select * from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME = #{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME}
select * from JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}
select PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_BADQUANTITY from PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE where PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID = #{PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID} and not PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_BADQUANTITY is null

select ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_NAME, ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_MODELNAME, ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_CONTEXT from WORKER_PROPERTY inner join ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT on ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID = WORKER_PROPERTY.ORIGIN_EQUIPMENT_ID where WORKER_PROPERTY.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID}
select * from JOBORDER_DETAIL where JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID}

select JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID, JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_NAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_OUTSOURCING, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_RUNNIGTIME, (select TOP 1 JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT_ID from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}) as 'JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT_ID', (select TOP 1 JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID from JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}) as 'JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT_ID', (select MAX(JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_ID) from JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID} ) as 'JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_ID' from JOBORDER_PROCESS LEFT OUTER join JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = #{JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID}

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_ACCOUNT_NAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_STOP_CONTEXT, JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_STOPTIME, JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT_RESTARTTIME from JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID LEFT OUTER join JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT on JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_STOPRESULT.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = #{JOBORDER_ID}

select count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_NOT_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_COMPLETE' from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY on PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID inner join JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT on JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID where PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID} and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME}+'%' and ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME Like '%'+#{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME}+'%'
select count(JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID) from JOBORDER_PROCESS where ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = #{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID}

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_MAIN_PRODUCTCODE, PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID, ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY on PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID inner join JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT on JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_LIST on BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_LIST_ID where PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID} and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME}+'%' and ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME Like '%'+#{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME}+'%'

select distinct PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID, ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY on PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID inner join ORIGIN_ACCOUNT on ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_ID inner join JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT on JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_LIST on BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_LIST_ID where PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY.PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{PROCESS_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID} and JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME}+'%' and ORIGIN_ACCOUNT.ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME Like '%'+#{ORIGIN_ACCOUNT_MEMBERNAME}+'%'

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_PUBLISHDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ DEILVERYDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, (select MAX(JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX) from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID) as MAX_VALUE, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_WORKOUT, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON > 0

select JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ENDDAY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_GOODQUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT on JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE on PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME = '수입검사*' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID = 4

select JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ENDDAY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_GOODQUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT on JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE on PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME = '수입검사*' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID = 4 and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER}+'%'

select JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ENDDAY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_GOODQUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT on JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID inner join PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE on PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME = '수입검사*' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID = 4 and (CONVERT(int, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ENDDAY,112)) between #{DEL_firstday} and #{DEL_secondday}) and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER}+'%'

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STARTDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_OUTSOURCING = 1 and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID > 0

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STARTDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_OUTSOURCING = 1 and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID > 0 and (CONVERT(int, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STARTDAY,112)) between #{PUB_firsday} and #{PUB_secondday}) and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER}+'%'

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STARTDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME as JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY from JOBORDER_PROCESS inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_OUTSOURCING = 1 and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_STATUS_ID > 0 and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_CUSTOMERNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER}+'%'

select COUNT(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_PUBLISH = 1 THEN 1 END) as 'TOTAL_JOBORDER', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_NOT_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_COMPLETE' from JOBORDER

select count(CASE WHEN BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION = '영업' THEN 1 END) as 'JOBORDER_SALES' , count(CASE WHEN BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION = '개발' THEN 1 END) as 'JOBORDER_INDUSTRY' from JOBORDER inner join BOM_DETAIL on BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID where JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID > 1

select JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, (CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN '대기' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN '진행중' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN '완료' END) as 'JOBORDER_STATUS_NAME' from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_DETAIL on BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID where not JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 1 order by JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY asc

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, (CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN '대기' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN '진행중' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN '완료' END) as 'JOBORDER_STATUS_NAME' from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_DETAIL on BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID where not JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 1 and JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = #{JOBORDER_STATUS_ID} order by JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY asc

select JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON, BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_MAIN_NAME, BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_MAIN_PRODUCTCODE, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PLANENDDAY, JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_EQUIPMENTNAME, (CASE WHEN JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 0 THEN '대기중' WHEN JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 1 THEN '생산 대기' WHEN JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 2 THEN '진행중' WHEN JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 3 THEN '생산 완료' WHEN JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 4 THEN '작업 중지' END) as 'JOBORDER_STATUS_NAME' from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID inner join BOM_LIST on BOM_LIST.BOM_LIST_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_LIST_ID inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER join JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT on JOBORDER_EQUIPMENT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID where JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = #{JOBORDER_ID}

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, (CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN '대기' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN '진행중' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN '완료' END) as 'JOBORDER_STATUS_NAME' from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_DETAIL on BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID where not JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 1 and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' order by JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY asc

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_DIVISION, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, (CASE WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN '대기' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN '진행중' WHEN JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN '완료' END) as 'JOBORDER_STATUS_NAME' from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join BOM_DETAIL on BOM_DETAIL.BOM_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.BOM_DETAIL_ID where not JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 1 and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and (CONVERT(int, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), JOBORDER.JOBORDER_PUBLISHDAY,112)) between #{PUB_firsday} and #{PUB_secondday}) order by JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY asc
select COUNT(*) as PROCESS_VALUES from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID = #{JOBORDER_ID} and JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 3

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_PUBLISHDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PLANENDDAY, (select MAX(JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX) from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID) as MAX_VALUE, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_WORKOUT, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_PLANENDDAY from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 1 or JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 2 or JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 4

select JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_STATUS_ID, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_NAME, JOBORDER.JOBORDER_PUBLISHDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_DEILVERYDAY, JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT, (select MAX(JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX) from JOBORDER_PROCESS where JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID) as MAX_VALUE, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_INDEX, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_WORKOUT, JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_PLANENDDAY from JOBORDER inner join JOBORDER_DETAIL on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_ID = JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID where JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON >= 1 and not JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_FOCUSON = 3 and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_JOBNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNAME}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_PRODUCTNUMBER}+'%' and JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT Like '%'+#{JOBORDER_DETAIL_CLIENT}+'%'

select count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_NOT_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_PROCEED', count(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN 1 END ) as 'TOTAL_COMPLETE' from JOBORDER

select COUNT(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_PUBLISH = 1 THEN 1 END) as 'TOTAL_JOBORDER', COUNT(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 4 THEN 1 END) as 'TOTAL_COMPLETE', COUNT(CASE WHEN JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 2 or JOBORDER_STATUS_ID = 3 THEN 1 END) as 'TOTAL_PROCEED' from JOBORDER

select PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_BADQUANTITY from LOG_TB inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT on JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT_ID = LOG_TB.JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT_ID inner join PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE on PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID = JOBORDER_PROCESS_RESULT.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_ID where not PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE.PROCESS_RESULT_TEMPLATE_BADQUANTITY is null

on JOBORDER_DETAIL.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID = LOG_TB.JOBORDER_DETAIL_ID inner join JOBORDER on JOBORDER.JOBORDER_ID = LOG_TB.JOBORDER_ID inner join JOBORDER_PROCESS on JOBORDER_PROCESS.JOBORDER_PROCESS_ID =
